Good Comments: Words are nice and visible....on time...song lyrics are correct
Bad Comments: unnecessary and annoying commentary in the notes.  don't want to see their opinion or thoughts on the show.
It's easy to keep up with and they even add footnotes .. they're just wonderful!

Although i dont speak or read japanese, I can comment on their use of words, ahich are well-chosen considering age and personality of the characters. Moreover, I relly like the joke on the 4th episode opening.
